import React from 'react' import "./SetGoals.css" import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' function SetGoals({setDisplayOverlay}) { const {currSelectedDate,currMonth,currYear} = useSelector((state) => state.uiSlice) const date = new Date() date.setMonth(currMonth); const monthSpell = date.toLocaleString('en-US', { month: 'long' }); return (

Target Date :

{`${currSelectedDate}/${currMonth}/${currYear}`}

) } export default SetGoals
